ygData.subject: Re: Bard's Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, cool...a level 50 bard! Is it as fun at level 50 as it is at level 12?  I hope so...that ll give me lots to look forward to!   :) Taluvil ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, cool...a level 50 bard!

Is it as fun at level 50 as it is at level 12? I hope so...that'll give me
lots to look forward to! :)

Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 7:06 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard's Instruments


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> the drum does, but no one has found the lute to increase any string song
> effects. perhaps it is a quest item or it is broken.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 15 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
>
> >
> > From: Aaron Fleischer <afleischer@...>
> >
> > Actually the Mistmoore Battle Drum and the Lute of the Gypsy
> > princess does
> > improve the songs they coincide with. I personally have the Mistmoore
> > Battle Drums and the stat improving songs do go up and I
> > believe the run
> > song is faster (although I don't think you will notice until
> > level 30).
> >
> > Mentia
> > Level 32 Bard
>
